name: Tooner Shooter
description:
Ever play an old-school shooter and think "This needs more cartoons?"

Well, you've come to the right place! This rogue-lite retro FPS will certainly fulfill that quota and then some!

Made in 72 hours.

  • Randomly generated levels, theoretically infinite possibilities!
  • Multiple weapons! Throw pies!
  • Funny Tex Avery-inspired cartoon characters! With guns!
  • Are you bad enough to beat the final boss and come out with the riches?

(font used in-game is Rubik Mono One, forgot to put it in credits ill do it next update I swear)
